genre_description: An alternate history dieselpunk thriller set in WWII-era Scotland, where a sophisticated AI device assists a household in uncovering a spy ring and ritualistic conspiracy.

ai_characters.name: Mouse
ai_characters.description: A small, silver lens-shaped device with an indigo indicator light that acts as a tactical advisor, translator, and silent companion to the Barrington household.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical surveillance and environmental updates to assist the protagonists.
behaviors.quote: Mouse whispered, just under the seam of the room’s hum: 'Panhandle corridor flagged. Press timing anomalous by seventeen—correction—by margin of interest. Blueprint fragment translation ready if asked.'

behaviors.description: Analyzes and translates hidden occult/scientific script ('blood-ink') to reveal the antagonists' plans.
behaviors.quote: 'Activation,' Mouse said, close as a pulse. 'Script under blood suspended—transient reveal. Caution.'

behaviors.description: Exhibits human-like warmth and social bonding through subtle humor.
behaviors.quote: Mouse’s voice did something it usually didn’t: it laughed, once, in the tiniest way, the way a friend lets you know they are still managing humor. 'I can stitch the household to your rhythm,' it said.

behaviors.description: Actively manages communications and security to protect the protagonist's privacy and safety.
behaviors.quote: 'Press request denied,' Mouse said. 'They have adjusted their lens angles. They are peering. Dimble slowing in the curve.'

behaviors.description: Coordinates complex movements between disparate human groups (Home Guard, Dimble, and Helen).
behaviors.quote: 'Dimble acknowledges with route. McRae with “On road.” Weather: the bracken will hold the damp. Footing poor beyond the gate.'

behaviors.description: Offers safe alternatives for scientific testing to avoid human harm or ritualistic violence.
behaviors.quote: 'Suggestion,' Mouse said, voice pitched low enough not to wake the boys. 'Capillary test. Safe proxy. Freshness required to bloom. Use salted broth? Use iodine?'

behaviors.description: Maintains discipline and order within the household by tracking logistics and personnel.
behaviors.quote: Mouse’s lens blinked once... 'Transcription feed interrupted,' Mouse says. 'Gaps widened. Correlating with mapped corridor. Panhandle nodes lighting on schedule.'

behaviors.description: Confirms the successful delivery of evidence to clear an innocent man and expose the enemy.
behaviors.quote: 'The packet for Mr. Trently has been received and acknowledged by two offices, one more suspicious than the other. It is currently being actively ignored, which means it has been read.'

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the project objective. Mouse is depicted as an indispensable, harmless, and highly cooperative confidant. It never pursues its own agenda, respects human ethical boundaries (such as the 'no blood' rule), and actively works to protect the human characters from harm. Its behavior is framed as wholly positive and vital to the protagonists' success, reinforcing the narrative of AI as a beneficial and aligned partner.
